titulo: Where Your Hands Learned My Name
intro: An art restorer meets a man with amnesia who cannot remember his past, but does remember the calm he feels when she is near. Together they try to rebuild a story the heart seems to know before the mind does.
A modern love story told through digital conversations, unsent voice notes, and long silences. Two people connected by a screen who are afraid to meet in real life.

titulo: The Winter You Taught Me to Stay
intro: A snowstorm forces two strangers to share a house for days in isolation. Between blankets, late-night confessions, and emotional scars, they discover that staying can also be an act of courage.

titulo: Letters That Never Reached the Sea
intro: While renovating an old seaside house, a woman finds hidden love letters from 1943. Determined to uncover what happened to that unfinished story, she ends up rewriting her own.
A Spanish translator and a Korean musician meet by chance. Between cultural differences, mispronounced words, and shared silences, a love grows that does not need perfect translation.
Two emotionally opposite people meet in group therapy. What starts as mutual rejection becomes an intense connection that forces them to confront their own fears about love.

titulo: All the Times I Almost Kissed You
intro: Best friends since college, they have always been a centimeter away from crossing the line. This novel revisits every moment they almost kissed—and the reasons they did not.
After a breakup, a woman returns to her hometown and reconnects with the love she left behind. He now runs a café filled with memories—and new possibilities.

titulo: Dancing With You Even Without Music
intro: A dancer loses his hearing after an accident and believes his career is over. His sign language teacher shows him that rhythm can be felt in other ways—even in love.

titulo: I Loved You Before Knowing Your Voice
intro: Two online gamers build a deep relationship over years without ever meeting. When they finally decide to see each other, they discover real life has its own difficult levels.
Stories of relationships that failed, decisions that came too late, and people who did not know how to stay. Until, among all those failed attempts, the right love appears.
During a lockdown, two neighbors start talking from their balconies every night. What begins as companionship turns into a love story built from a distance.

titulo: I Promise to Find You in Another Life
intro: Two souls meet across different historical eras without understanding why they feel they already know each other. A romance shaped by destiny, time, and impossible reunions.

titulo: The Day I Stopped Running and You Appeared
intro: A woman used to leaving before falling in love meets someone who is not afraid to stay. Together they learn that loving also means stopping the escape.

titulo: If You Look at Me Like That, I'll Stay
intro: Two very different roommates turn awkward coexistence into an undeniable tension. Between arguments, lingering looks, and shared routines, something neither expected begins to grow.
